session.name: Intermediate
session.description: For students who have either been through my beginner course (and know the first two Welsh tunes), or anyone with a working knowledge of the harp, and knows how to play a few pieces (or more) with both hands.

session.name: Advanced
session.description: For students with more extensive experience, this class will basically be a continuation of the Winter Term class, but open to all advanced players.

repretoire.name: Warm Island (Hawaiian slack-key style, with guitar-like techniques and ornamentation)

session.name: Beginner II
session.description: For students who are either continuing from the last Winter term and want some review plus more; or those who are starting for the first time but have had a good intro from me – we’ll warm up with fingering exercises, scales and arpeggios, review the first two Welsh harp tunes, (which gives you all the fundamentals of harp playing) and add more to your repertoire.
